AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hugo Benavides: United States Border Patrol Agent who questioned Defendant at the Border Patrol station and did not corroborate Agent Trevino's testimony about the black truck having a camper
Defendant whose involuntary transportation to the Border Patrol station for questioning was deemed 'sufficiently like an arrest' and required probable cause, testified that Agent Benavides asked him questions using bad language on the way to the Border Patrol station
